description: Updates a project on a Microreact server.

input.name: project
input.description: The ID (e.g. `fCXBPv48KNkm5oZq8UWdHG`) or the URL (e.g. `https://microreact.org/project/fCXBPv48KNkm5oZq8UWdHG`) of the project to be updated.

input.name: name
input.description:
The project name.
Defaults to "Unnamed project".

input.name: data
input.description: Data in CSV format or a URL linking to a CSV file.

input.name: tree
input.description: An optional phylogenetic tree in Newick format or a URL linking to a Newick file.

input.name: network
input.description: An optional network in DOT format or a URL linking to a DOT file.

input.name: api
input.description:
The URL of the Microreact server API.
Defaults to `https://microreact.org/api`.

input.name: id column
input.description:
The column name that will be used as the ID.
Defaults to `id`.

input.name: timeline column
input.description:
The column name which contains the timeline data.
Defaults to null.

input.name: latitude column
input.description:
The column name which contains map latitude values.
Defaults to null.

input.name: longitude column
input.description:
The column name which contains map longitude values.
Defaults to null.

output.name: id
output.description: The ID of the updated project.

output.name: url
output.description: The URL of the updated project.
